Sentece: The mean recoveries -were 92-107% (0.301-20.0 mg/L, n = 2), 80-82% (0.0948-6.32 mg/L, n = 2) and 88% (0.0200 mg/mL, n = 5), for dapsone, hydroxylaminodapsone and diazoxide, respectively.
Title: High-performance liquid chromatographic method with ultraviolet detection for the determination of dapsone and its hydroxylated metabolite in human plasma.

Parameter: apparent volume of distribution at steady state (Vdss
Sentece: Individual concentration-time curves were analyzed to determine the apparent volume of distribution at steady state (Vdss range, 0.178 to 0.250 liter/kg), beta t 1/2 (range, 32 to 62.5 hours), and plasma clearance rate (Clp range, 2.2 to 5.3 ml/kg . hour-1) for the calculation of loading and maintenance doses designed to produce steady-state concentrations within 0.5 hours.
Title: Diazoxide concentration-response relation in hypertension.
Name: Diazoxide

Sentece: The Ki value was 4.34 +/- 0.04 x 10(7) M, and the displacement potency of A-4166 was between that of glibenclamide and tolbutamide, being similar to that of gliclazide.
Title: Hypoglycaemic and insulinotropic effects of a novel oral antidiabetic agent, (-)-N-(trans-4-isopropylcyclohexanecarbonyl)-D-phenylalanine (A-4166).
Name: Diazoxide
